text: add listfiles attribute (like javac has) to rmic task
creator: rtalkov@appworx.com
bugs@mark.ziesemer.com
text:
Please see the latest patch on bug #20699 - does this appear to be what you're 
looking for?

It already has a method "public Vector getCompileList()".  Does it need to have 
a specific "listfiles" one as well?  This seems to fit into the Ant 2 plan for 
consistently-named attributes, etc., though I'm not sure if this is something 
that should be changed now or later...
